intro.title: Getting started
intro.description: Let's discover Docusaurus in less than 5 minutes.

Share/embed.title: Embedding Content
Share/embed.description: Embed Widgets on Your Website - This feature allows you to share real-time, interactive data visualizations on your website with your audience without any hassle. Simply generate the widget link and embed it into your site's HTML. It's that easy!

Share/exports.title: Exports
Share/exports.description: Breadcrumb provides the ability to download widgets and datasets in various formats for offline use. This feature allows you to work with your data in the format that best suits your requirements.

Share/intro.title: Sharing in Breadcrumb
Share/intro.description: This section covers how to share and collaborate within Breadcrumb.

Share/inviting-collaborators.title: Inviting Collaborators
Share/inviting-collaborators.description: Invite Collaborators for Real-Time Editing - Breadcrumb's collaborative environment means everyone can see updates in real-time, discuss changes, and make decisions together. It's perfect for teams spread across different locations or those who need to work closely on data-driven projects.

Share/publish.title: Publishing Content
Share/publish.description: Edit and Share Whole Reports - Breadcrumb allows you to share entire reports with your team or stakeholders. You can edit these reports collaboratively, ensuring everyone has access to the latest insights and can contribute to the analysis process in real-time.

Spaces/Creating-Spaces/intro.title: Creating Spaces in Breadcrumb
Spaces/Creating-Spaces/intro.description: Follow these steps to create a space in Breadcrumb and start building your dashboards:

Spaces/intro.title: Spaces in Breadcrumb
Spaces/intro.description: This section covers everything you need to know about working with Spaces in Breadcrumb.

Spaces/Space-Canvas/groups.title: Groups Feature Overview
Spaces/Space-Canvas/groups.description: Breadcrumb's Groups feature is designed to enhance the organization and interaction with your data visualizations. With Groups, you can create, manage, and view multiple analytic dashboards within a single space, offering greater clarity and flexibility in your data analysis process.

Spaces/Space-Canvas/intro.title: Space Canvas
Spaces/Space-Canvas/intro.description: This section covers how to use the Space Canvas feature in Breadcrumb.
